# execute nProbe for collecting netflow data

= Installation =
{{{
wget http://hadoop-dna.googlecode.com/files/nProbe-4.9.4.tar.gz
tar -zxvf nProbe-4.9.4.tar.gz
cd nProbe
./autogen.sh
make
make install
}}}
To compile nProbe, libtool, autoconf, automake, libpcap-dev are needed.
